awd_titl_txt: IVth Conference on the Intersections between Particle and   Nuclear Physics; Tucson, Arizona, May 23-29, 1991
awd_abstract_narration: This award will provide partial support to the IVth                        Conference on the Intersections between Particle and Nuclear                    Physics, Tucson, Arizona, 5/23-29/91.                                                The conference will bring together particle and nuclear                    physicists to discuss the entire range of topics in the energy                  domain of 1 to 100 GeV.  The discussions will include heavy                     ion physics as component of particle physics, electrons as                      probes of particle physics within the nucleus, rare decays of                   mesons, deep inelastic scattering of muons.  The conference                     will serve to improve the communication among people working                    on similar projects and enhance the exploitation of present                     and future facilities.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
